scripts.watcher-win: start npx sass --watch resources/scss/index.scss static/css/index.css && start npx sass --watch resources/scss/print.scss static/css/print.css
scripts.css: npx sass resources/scss/index.scss static/css/index.css && npx sass resources/scss/print.scss static/css/print.css
scripts.watcher-mac: open npx sass --watch resources/scss/index.scss static/css/index.css; open npx sass --watch resources/scss/print.scss static/css/print.css
